Ledu/mit/application_modeling/MainActivi: The method onCreate in MainActivity initializes the UI by setting its content view to a predefined resource ID, retrieves the TelephonyManager service for device identification, stores the device's IMEI in an application-specific field, and starts AnotherActivity.
Ledu/mit/application_modeling/AnotherAct: The onCreate method in AnotherActivity initializes the UI by setting its content view to a predefined resource ID (2130903040), retrieves the application context, logs the device's IMEI using Log.i, and does not read or write any fields.
